Package Project

Class User

java.lang.Object
Project.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Admin
public class User
extends java.lang.Object
This class holds all the functionality and information for the users.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    User()
    User Constructor for database connection and preparing statements for database functionality.
    User​(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password, int permissionID, java.lang.String organisation)
    User Constructor without ID, database creates the ID - Mainly used for user login.
    User​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String LastName, java.lang.String userName, int userID, int orgUnitID, int permissionID, java.lang.String password)
    User Constructor with ID - Creates a new user object with a user ID set.
    User​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String LastName, java.lang.String userName, int orgUnitID, int permissionID, java.lang.String password)
    User Constructor without ID, database creates the ID - Creates a new user object with a user ID set with out the user ID.
    User​(java.math.BigDecimal credits, java.math.BigDecimal pending)
    User Constructor to hold user credits and pending credits

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User()
      User Constructor for database connection and preparing statements for database functionality.

    • User

      public User​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String LastName, java.lang.String userName, int userID, int orgUnitID, int permissionID, java.lang.String password)
      User Constructor with ID - Creates a new user object with a user ID set.
      Parameters:
      firstName - The first name of the user.
      LastName - The last name of the user.
      userName - The username of the user.
      userID - The ID of the user.
      orgUnitID - The ID of the organisational unit the user belongs to.
      permissionID - The access level of the user.
      password - The password of the user.

    • User

      public User​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String LastName, java.lang.String userName, int orgUnitID, int permissionID, java.lang.String password)

      LastName - The last name of the user.
      userName - The username of the user.
      orgUnitID - The ID of the organisational unit the user belongs to.
      permissionID - The access level of the user.
      password - The password of the user.

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      public void addUser​(User u)
      Adds user into the database and hashes password
      Parameters:
      u - User object to add.

    • getPermType

      public java.lang.String getPermType​(int permId) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Get Permissions name from its ID.
      Parameters:
      permId - The id of the permission.
      Returns:
      The permission type, otherwise returns null.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - when something goes wrong with the database.

    • userLoginValidation

      public boolean userLoginValidation​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) throws java.sql.SQLException
      User Login - Searches the username and check if password matches.
      Parameters:
      username - Username to check is contained in the database
      password - Password to check against password stored as hash within database
      Returns:
      True if login details provided where valid, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - when something goes wrong with the database.

    • getAllPermissions

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAllPermissions() throws java.sql.SQLException
      Retrieves the all the types of permissions from the database. Grabs all permission types to be used under dropdown option in user creations.
      Returns:
      An arraylist of strings containing the different type of permissions levels.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - when something goes wrong with the database.

    • getAllOrganisations

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAllOrganisations() throws java.sql.SQLException
      Retrieves all organisation units to be used under dropdown option in user creations.
      Returns:
      An arraylist of strings containing the names of all the different organisations in the database.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - when something goes wrong with the database.

    • getAllUserNames

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAllUserNames()
      Retrieves all usernames that exists in the system.
      Returns:
      An arraylist of strings containing the names of all users in the database.

    • getPermId

      public int getPermId​(java.lang.String permType) throws java.sql.SQLException

      Returns:
      The Permission id of the given name type.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - when something goes wrong with the database.

    • getAllUser

      public javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel getAllUser() throws java.sql.SQLException
      Lists all user data in a table under Admin settings for user creations.
      Returns:
      Default Table Model containing all the users in the database.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - when something goes wrong with the database.

      Returns:
